SEARCH
Package Service

Class AdministratorService

Object
UserService<Administrator,AdministratorRepository>
AdministratorService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IService<Administrator,AdministratorRepository>
public class AdministratorService extends UserService<Administrator,AdministratorRepository>
Service class for administrator-specific operations. Extends UserService to provide functionalities such as managing users, appointments, medications, and replenishment requests.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs an AdministratorService with the given repository.

    • getFilteredStaff

      public Collection<User> getFilteredStaff(String role, String gender, int minAge, int maxAge, String name)
      Retrieves a filtered list of staff members based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the staff (e.g., Doctor, Pharmacist, or All).
      gender - the gender of the staff to filter by.
      minAge - the minimum age of the staff to include.
      maxAge - the maximum age of the staff to include.
      name - a substring of the staff name to filter by.
      Returns:
      a collection of staff members matching the criteria.
